question: Who among the following rulers of Delhi Sultanate is known as a “Man of Ideas”?
explanation: Sultan Muhammad Bin Tughlaq is known as a “Man of Ideas” . He was a trained intellectual, a keen student of Persian poetry and a philosopher, lover of science and mathematics. He is known for the idea of a Central Capital and experiments with a nominal token Currency. In all, he was a very talented person but due to impatience and lack of judgement he did not turned into a good emperor.
